content: this square garter stitch afghan is made from four triangles that you join as you go while alternating two different colors of lion brand mandala only one seam joins the first and last triangle fringe is created by picking up stitches around the afghan once the center is complete from the pattern **dimensions ** about 30 x 30 in 76x 76 cm **materials ** lion brand® mandala® art #525 * 225 sprite 1 cake a * 209 gnome 1 cake b lion brand® large-eyed blunt needle
